column6: Romance is in the air â€" for both old and new lovers alike, and just in time for Valentine's Day! Mystique's power play is kicking into full gear as more is revealed about her plans to control her destiny. And what happens when she gets one of the very last control words, and with it the power to get everything she ever wanted.
